name: Arena Games Platform Inc.
description: ArenaVS is an AI-native Web3 marketplace for launching, trading, and managing tokenized digital assets
one_liner: ArenaVS is an AI-native Web3 marketplace for launching, trading, and managing tokenized digital assets

name: BitPowr Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.

name: Gaspack, Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of nonfungible token launchpad intended to empower creators, artists, and brands to generate extra income. The company's launchpad helps content creators and artists build their internet protocol into nonfungible token projects, from the development phase to the launching, scaling, and maintaining them as sustainable businesses, providing artists and brands with full tech stack support, community management, and creative consultancy to help them embark in their content creation journey.
one_liner: Developer of nonfungible token launchpad intended to empower creators, artists, and brands to generate extra income. The company's launchpad helps content creators and artists build their internet protocol into nonfungible token projects, from the development phase to the launching, scaling, and maintaining them as sustainable businesses, providing artists and brands with full tech stack support, community management, and creative consultancy to help them embark in their content creation journey.

name: Kiki Corp.
description: Developer of a social application designed to connect like-minded real people to enjoy nearby experiences. The company's application permits users to search for a companion and organize plans with them, enabling users to make new friends and cultivate beautiful relationships.
one_liner: Developer of a social application designed to connect like-minded real people to enjoy nearby experiences. The company's application permits users to search for a companion and organize plans with them, enabling users to make new friends and cultivate beautiful relationships.

name: Good Morning Ser Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.
one_liner: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.

name: LifeSite, Inc.
description: Developer of an online life and family management platform designed to manage family records and documents. The company's platform combines file access and controlled, permission-based sharing with high-level document encryption and security, enabling users to get a safe and smart digital storage solution to store, organize and access the most important information in their life anytime and anywhere.
one_liner: Developer of an online life and family management platform designed to manage family records and documents. The company's platform combines file access and controlled, permission-based sharing with high-level document encryption and security, enabling users to get a safe and smart digital storage solution to store, organize and access the most important information in their life anytime and anywhere.

name: Stackseer Technologies Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a risk monitoring platform intended to detect and prevent the illegal use of cryptocurrency. The company's platform is an easy-to-use rule management interface that helps users visualize account activity across time and generate forensic reports, enabling blockchain companies, crypto-exchanges, investment funds, banks and regulators to perform due diligence and compliance on the blockchain to detect, investigate and prevent the use of cryptocurrency fraud.
one_liner: Operator of a risk monitoring platform intended to detect and prevent the illegal use of cryptocurrency. The company's platform is an easy-to-use rule management interface that helps users visualize account activity across time and generate forensic reports, enabling blockchain companies, crypto-exchanges, investment funds, banks and regulators to perform due diligence and compliance on the blockchain to detect, investigate and prevent the use of cryptocurrency fraud.

name: Send4 Tecnologia Ltda.
description: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. The company's platform connects consumers to brands through interfaces in an omnichannel concept, increasing logistics and service efficiency and eliminating customer experience gaps in the process of exchanging and returning purchases, enabling retailers to offer a seamless post-purchase experience to their customers.
one_liner: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. The company's platform connects consumers to brands through interfaces in an omnichannel concept, increasing logistics and service efficiency and eliminating customer experience gaps in the process of exchanging and returning purchases, enabling retailers to offer a seamless post-purchase experience to their customers.

name: Solana Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a decentralized blockchain platform designed to deliver a scalable blockchain network. The company's platform unlocks concurrent graphics processing unit parallelization, using proof of history, delivering high speed, low latency, and inexpensive transactions, all at layer without sharding, enabling users to scale over transactions on stock hardware.
one_liner: Developer of a decentralized blockchain platform designed to deliver a scalable blockchain network. The company's platform unlocks concurrent graphics processing unit parallelization, using proof of history, delivering high speed, low latency, and inexpensive transactions, all at layer without sharding, enabling users to scale over transactions on stock hardware.

name: Terminal 3 HK Limited
description: Provider of Web3 data solutions intended to protect users' privacy information. The company leverages decentralized storage and zero-knowledge proofs to allow secure information access, enabling clients to securely store their data, control its access permissions and use across applications and websites.
one_liner: Provider of Web3 data solutions intended to protect users' privacy information. The company leverages decentralized storage and zero-knowledge proofs to allow secure information access, enabling clients to securely store their data, control its access permissions and use across applications and websites.

name: The Ticket Fairy, Inc.
description: Ticket Fairy is Salesforce meets Eventbrite - AI-enabled vertical SaaS for events and venues that skyrockets their revenues and accelerates their path to profitability!
one_liner: Ticket Fairy is Salesforce meets Eventbrite - AI-enabled vertical SaaS for events and venues that skyrockets their revenues and accelerates their path to profitability!
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Blockchain, Leisure & Entretainment, Marketplace, SaaS, Ticketing, Web 3, CRM, Entertainment / Media, Social Media, B2B Marketplaces, Commerce

name: Umoja Labs Corp.
description: The best and safest way to monetize your Bitcoin.
one_liner: The best and safest way to monetize your Bitcoin.

name: UniSub LLC
description: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
one_liner: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.
industry: Blockchain, Crypto, FinTech, Gambling, Payments, SaaS, Web 3

name: Virtualtech Frontier Sdn. Bhd.
description: Developer and provider of virtual event solutions created to serve as a catalyst to promote collaboration and engagement by bridging digital technologies into real-world applications. The company offers virtual solutions for any type of event including virtual exhibitions, classrooms, and conferences, live-stream events, along with some added features such as allowing visitors to take photos and edit them for social media, online payment gateway integration, enabling users to sell and carry out transactions directly from their virtual events among others.
one_liner: Developer and provider of virtual event solutions created to serve as a catalyst to promote collaboration and engagement by bridging digital technologies into real-world applications. The company offers virtual solutions for any type of event including virtual exhibitions, classrooms, and conferences, live-stream events, along with some added features such as allowing visitors to take photos and edit them for social media, online payment gateway integration, enabling users to sell and carry out transactions directly from their virtual events among others.
industry: SaaS, Web 3, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality

name: Wivity Inc.
description: Developer of a governance and SaaS infrastructure designed for industry web3 collaborations. The company's framework combines consortium best practices with decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) mechanics, helping industries in implementing and governing decentralized infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a governance and SaaS infrastructure designed for industry web3 collaborations. The company's framework combines consortium best practices with decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) mechanics, helping industries in implementing and governing decentralized infrastructure.

name: Gluwa, Inc.
description: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.
one_liner: Gluwa is a builder of Gluwa, Creditcoin, and a stealth protocol. Gluwa connects DeFi investors to TradFi investment opportunities. Creditcoin is an interoperable credit network that powers Gluwa. The stealth protocol provides trustless proof-of-location, which enhances the security and usability of Gluwa.
